MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

RoboSoft.Company_Description: Cigati Solutions is a renowned name in the field of Data Recovery & Database Backup Recovery and Email Migration. It has a wide range of software solutions to recover and migrate data from different databases and email clients.

NewsFeed.NewsFeed_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your RSS and Atom news feeds info into your PAD file. This info can be used by RSS feed submission software or by feed directories themselves.

Site.Site_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your site info into your PAD file. This info can be used by site submission software or by web directories themselves.
Site.Site_Description_100: An extensive solution to convert MSG files into EML.
Site.Site_Description_250: Cigati MSG to EML Converter Tool is a robust utility to convert MSG file data into EML format. It allows users to export multiple MSG files into EML format in a single run. Additionally, you can migrate these MSG files into various email clients.
Site.Site_Description_450: Outlook MSG to EML Converter helps to backup MSG file data into EML format. It also facilitates users to export the MSG file data into EMLX, PST, PDF, MBOX, MSG, CSV, HTML, MHTML, etc. It provides the preview of the MSG file data before starting the conversion. This utility maintains high data integrity throughout the entire conversion task. The Free MSG to EML Converter allows you to convert the first 50 emails per folder.
Site.Site_Keywords: MSG to EML Converter, MSG to EML Converter Tool, MSG to EML Converter Software, Outlook MSG to EML Converter, Free MSG to EML Converter, Best MSG to EML Converter, MSG to EML Conversion, MSG to EML Co

Press_Release.Press_Release: Cigati MSG to EML Converter Software is an eminent solution to convert MSG files into EML format. This software is equipped with some advanced features to enhance the overall performance of this utility. It is a secure and prominent software that ensures high data security during the conversion process. Additionally, it provides an intuitive user interface that helps novice users to navigate through the entire process.

It is one of the best MSG to EML Converter that maintains the original hierarchy by keeping the file data intact. There are multiple advanced features embedded that help users to get the best result.

English.Keywords: MSG to EML Converter, MSG to EML Converter Tool, MSG to EML Converter Software, Outlook MSG to EML Converter, Free MSG to EML Converter, Best MSG to EML Converter, MSG to EML Conversion, MSG to EML Converter Online
English.Char_Desc_80: An extensive solution to convert MSG files into EML.
English.Char_Desc_250: Cigati MSG to EML Converter Tool is a robust utility to convert MSG file data into EML format. It allows users to export multiple MSG files into EML format in a single run. Additionally, you can migrate these MSG files into various email clients.
English.Char_Desc_450: Outlook MSG to EML Converter helps to backup MSG file data into EML format. It also facilitates users to export the MSG file data into EMLX, PST, PDF, MBOX, MSG, CSV, HTML, MHTML, etc. It provides the preview of the MSG file data before starting the conversion. This utility maintains high data integrity throughout the entire conversion task. The Free MSG to EML Converter allows you to convert the first 50 emails per folder.
English.Char_Desc_2000: Cigati MSG to EML Converter Software is a modern-day software with an interactive interface. It doesn't require to sound technical for operating this software. It is compatible with both technical and non-technical users. This utility helps you to convert MSG file data into EML and other file formats. Users can verify the MSG file data in the preview panel of this utility. You can add single or multiple files/folders to convert them into EML files. After installing the Cigati MSG to EML Converter, you need to run it as an administrator. Now, choose the single or multiple MSG files that you want to convert. Then, you can verify the file data from its preview section. Here, it provides the saving options, you can opt for EML format from the Saves/Backup/Migrate As option. Here, you can specify the Mail Filter along with the Naming convention and Destination path. Then, check on the advanced features provided by this utility. After that, you can click on the Convert button to initiate the process. Users can also download the report of this entire conversion task. With the help of this MSG to EML Converter, users can also migrate their MSG files into several email clients including, Gmail, Yahoo Mail, Office 365, Thunderbird, AOL, Hotmail, IMAP, etc. This advanced utility ensures high data security by maintaining the original file hierarchy throughout the entire process. You can opt for Single, Administrator, Technician, and Enterprise licenses according to your preferences. Additionally, It provides a free trial version to experience its advanced functionality. You can smoothly operate this utility in all the different versions of Windows OS.
